Minimum:
  • OS: If it can run Steam, it can run this game
  • Processor: Whatever you have in your computer should work
  • Memory: 500 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Black and White with shades of green and red
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: If you hear it bleep, then it bloops

Minimum:
  • OS: Uhnm, I don't know, maybe?
  • Processor: Stronger than a calculator would be ideal
  • Memory: 500 MB RAM
  • Graphics: If you compile it right, it should be black and white, mostly
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: It's chiptune, I doubt you need anything spectacular
